external_games.name: Planet Coaster - Knight Rider K.I.T.T. Construction Kit

name: Planet Coaster: Knight Rider K.I.T.T. Construction Kit
summary: The Knight Rider K.I.T.T. Construction Kit features in-game replicas of K.I.T.T., K.I.T.T. in Super Pursuit mode, and the evil Knight Industries prototype K.A.R.R. with silver and black finish.
